item.title: 3Lou55 Owner of Grinderscape Kick off Mopar
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:19, topic:421164”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=523830.msg3811607#msg3811607 date=1320978718]

I wouldn’t pay 350$ for a PS3 let alone a shitty programmed RSPS that will be down in 3 months. Honestly people, donate the money to charity instead to this stupid fuckhead with a private server.

He says, selling webclient “work” in his signature. Rofl, you’re just as bad.

You do know he’s selling digital things. I’m actually programming. Oh and, your a fucking dumbass.
[/quote]
Changing playerRights = 0; to playerRights = 1; is still technically programming, as it’s Java, and it’s being edited. The same applies for adding an item to an account.

You both accept money for Java. Therefore you have no ground to stand on.[/quote]
Therefore your a fucking idiot. tyb is correct.

Read full topic
item.source: 3Lou55 Owner of Grinderscape Kick off Mopar

item.title: 3Lou55 Owner of Grinderscape Kick off Mopar
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“3lou 55, post:8, topic:421164”]Hello,

Indeed everyone is trying to down my server because some kids are just jelous. I’m not afraid to say I’m selling admin or mod spot but it is truely lies someone can easily photoshop the text below. I’m not selling any staff and you can ask my staff members on the forums and you can ask them and ask the members how they earned it, however my players rage if I sell staff. I never sold staff or anything custom. My donation is http://www.grinderscape.org/subscribe.php

Regards,[/quote]
im jelous

Read full topic

item.description:
@JBacon wrote:

This guy needs to be taken off mopar, he is sucking his players dry. I have proof here. I also have a youtube video as 100% solid proof that this is really him if you would like me to post it.

http://baconscape.com/forum/showpost.php?p=8064&postcount=1

Edit - He also went on his website denying this whole conversation saying that I lied about it. Matter of fact, I’ll even post the youtube vid right now.

His behavior is disgusting.

Read full topic
